price: Bundan sonra, Firavun, onları ülkeden çıkarmak istemiş, biz de onu ve onunla beraber olanları toptan suda boğuvermiştik.
arabic: فَأَرَادَ أَن يَسۡتَفِزَّهُم مِّنَ ٱلۡأَرۡضِ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُۥ جَمِيعٗا

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-arāda an yastafizzahum mina al-arḍi fa-aghraqnāhu waman maʿahu jamīʿan
